interactions.text: I'm feeling really stressed about my presentation tomorrow.
interactions.suggestion: When anxiety rises, grounding exercises can help. Try the 5-4-3-2-1 technique (5 things you see, 4 things you feel, etc).

interactions.text: Just finished my workout and feeling good!
interactions.suggestion: It's great to see you're feeling positive! Keep that energy going with a quick walk outside.

interactions.text: Had a really long day at work, feeling completely drained.
interactions.suggestion: Your body might need rest. Even a short 20-minute nap can rejuvenate your energy levels.
